revised_title: Cytological Transformations in Malignant Growths and Their Resemblance to Normal Reproductive Tissues
tldr: The authors investigate the cytological transformations in malignant growths and find a surprising degree of similarity between these transformations and the development of normal reproductive tissues. They describe the changes in cell division and the resemblance in the formation of giant cells, suggesting that these similarities may shed light on the nature of malignant growths and their remote causes.
